h2_title: How to Find Mother of Flamlings
h3_title: Mother of Flamlings Boss Fight and Guide
content: The ground will rumble as the Mother of Flamlings appears, and fireballs will be thrown out as soon as she bursts through the ground. Stand back after delivering the Flame Ores to avoid this attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mother_of_Flamlings.md', within the main section titled 'Mother of Flamlings', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Mother of Flamlings' and the sub-subsection 'Mother of Flamlings Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The ground will rumble as the Mother of Flamlings appears, and fireballs will be thrown out as soon as she bursts through the ground. Stand back after delivering the Flame Ores to avoid this attack.
